meanings.definition: Capable of being split around the circumference.
meanings.sent1: The circumscissile fruit easily splits open along its circumference.
meanings.sent2: The circumscissile shell cracked neatly around the middle.
meanings.sent3: The circumscissile cookie broke perfectly in half, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt circumscissile, torn between two conflicting emotions.
meanings.sent5: The circumscissile balloon burst with a loud pop, scattering confetti everywhere.

meanings.definition: A plant organ that splits open around the circumference to release seeds.
meanings.sent1: The circumscissile pod burst open, scattering seeds in all directions.
meanings.sent2: The circumscissile fruit split open to disperse its seeds.
meanings.sent3: The circumscissile flower opened up like a surprise gift, revealing its seeds.
meanings.sent4: The circumscissile plant seemed to explode with life as its seeds were released.
meanings.sent5: The circumscissile seed pod resembled a tiny treasure chest, revealing its contents.

meanings.definition: A type of dehiscence in which a fruit or seed pod splits open around the circumference.
meanings.sent1: The circumscissile dehiscence of the seed pod allowed for easy seed dispersal.
meanings.sent2: The circumscissile dehiscence of the fruit ensured the seeds were spread far and wide.
meanings.sent3: The circumscissile dehiscence of the plant was like a natural fireworks show.
meanings.sent4: The circumscissile dehiscence of the pod was a beautiful display of nature's design.
meanings.sent5: The circumscissile dehiscence of the fruit pod was a marvel to behold, releasing seeds gracefully.
